speaker: Gianpaolo
title: 2022 OpenCV Hackathon Winners | Team B-AROL-O and the ARNEIS project
description:
We're excited to welcome the popular vote winners of the 2022 OpenCV Hackathon, team B-AROL-O! They'll share their award-winning ARNEIS project with us!
